ROOT.ds0: select d.id as deviceid, col3 as devicename, col4 as typename, name as stationname, group_name as voltagename, case when '{1}'=d.id then 'true' else '' end as selected from YS_DB_HB.ysh_sc_device d left join YS_DB_HB.YSH_SC_STATION t on d.col0=t.name left join YS_DB_HB.ysh_search_order tt on d.col4=tt.col_value and tt.col_name='type' order by voltagename desc,idx,tt.order_index desc,col3
